span.style: display: block; white-space: pre-wrap; margin: 0; padding: 0; font-family: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', 'Courier New', monospace !important;

font.b: {{- if .Get "prompt" -}}{{ .Get "prompt" }}{{- else -}}{{ .Get "user" | default "kevin" }}@{{ .Get "host" | default "kmcd.dev" }}:{{ .Get "dir" | default "~" }}${{- end -}}
